languages.text: "Вы... не знаете, что такое имморталиум?" {n}Кассия чуть разочарованно склоняет голову.{/n} "У него существует и другое название — "бессмертный цветок". Живое растение, способное столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Это... символ начала и старинный ритуал. Отправная точка, в которой зарождаются отношения двух особ, отличные от вежливого безразличия".

traits.locale_text: "Вы... не знаете, что такое имморталиум?" {n}Кассия чуть разочарованно склоняет голову.{/n} "У него существует и другое название — "бессмертный цветок". Живое растение, способное столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Это... символ начала и старинный ритуал. Отправная точка, в которой зарождаются отношения двух особ, отличные от вежливого безразличия".

languages.text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."
languages.original_text: "Вы... не знаете, что такое имморталиум?" {n}Кассия чуть разочарованно склоняет голову.{/n} "У него существует и другое название — "бессмертный цветок". Живое растение, способное столетия обитать в пустоте космоса. Это... символ начала и старинный ритуал. Отправная точка, в которой зарождаются отношения двух особ, отличные от вежливого безразличия".

A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

"You... do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

languages.text: «No... ¿no sabe qué es un inmortalium?». {n}Cassia baja la cabeza con aire decepcionado.{/n} «También se conoce como "flor eterna". Es una planta capaz de sobrevivir en el vacío del espacio durante cientos de años. Es el símbolo de los comienzos... y de un antiguo ritual. Señala el momento en que la relación entre dos personas puede crecer y trascender los límites de la indiferencia que impone la cortesía».
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: «No... ¿no sabe qué es un inmortalium?». {n}Cassia baja la cabeza con aire decepcionado.{/n} «También se conoce como "flor eterna". Es una planta capaz de sobrevivir en el vacío del espacio durante cientos de años. Es el símbolo de los comienzos... y de un antiguo ritual. Señala el momento en que la relación entre dos personas puede crecer y trascender los límites de la indiferencia que impone la cortesía».

languages.text: 「あなたは…イモータリウムがなんなのか知らないのですか？」{n}カシアはがっかりしたように頭を少し下げた。{/n}「あれは…“永久花”とも呼ばれています。真空の宇宙空間で何百年も生存できる植物です。何かの始まり、そして…古代の儀式の象徴なのです。ふたりの人間の関係がよそよそしさから脱し、より深まることを示しています」
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは…イモータリウムがなんなのか知らないのですか？」{n}カシアはがっかりしたように頭を少し下げた。{/n}「あれは…“永久花”とも呼ばれています。真空の宇宙空間で何百年も生存できる植物です。何かの始まり、そして…古代の儀式の象徴なのです。ふたりの人間の関係がよそよそしさから脱し、より深まることを示しています」

languages.text: “你……不知道永生花是什么吗？”{n}卡西娅垂下头，似乎有些失望。{/n}“它还有另一个名字，叫‘永不凋谢之花’。这种花可以在真空中存活数百年之久。它象征着开始……以及某种古代的仪式。送出这朵花，就代表两人之间的关系可以以此为起点进一步发展，不必再拘泥于冷淡的礼节。”
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: “你……不知道永生花是什么吗？”{n}卡西娅垂下头，似乎有些失望。{/n}“它还有另一个名字，叫‘永不凋谢之花’。这种花可以在真空中存活数百年之久。它象征着开始……以及某种古代的仪式。送出这朵花，就代表两人之间的关系可以以此为起点进一步发展，不必再拘泥于冷淡的礼节。”

languages.text: « Vous... ignorez ce qu'est un immortalium ? {n}demande Cassia, puis elle baisse la tête, l'air déçu.{/n} On le nomme aussi "la fleur éternelle". Il est capable de survivre dans le vide spatial pendant des centaines d'années. C'est le symbole des commencements... et on l'utilise dans un très ancien rituel qui marque le point à partir duquel une relation entre deux personnes se développe au-delà d'une indifférence polie. »
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... ignorez ce qu'est un immortalium ? {n}demande Cassia, puis elle baisse la tête, l'air déçu.{/n} On le nomme aussi "la fleur éternelle". Il est capable de survivre dans le vide spatial pendant des centaines d'années. C'est le symbole des commencements... et on l'utilise dans un très ancien rituel qui marque le point à partir duquel une relation entre deux personnes se développe au-delà d'une indifférence polie. »

languages.text: "Ihr ... wisst nicht, was ein Immortalium ist?" {n}Cassias Kopf senkt sich vor Enttäuschung leicht.{/n} "Es gibt noch einen anderen Namen dafür: die 'ewige Blume'. Eine lebende Pflanze, die einhundert Jahre lang im Vakuum des Weltraums überleben kann. Sie ist das Symbol für Anfänge ... und für ein uraltes Ritual. Sie markiert den Anfangspunkt, von dem aus die Beziehung zwischen zwei Personen erwachsen kann, sich über höfliche Gleichgültigkeit hinaus entwickeln kann."
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... wisst nicht, was ein Immortalium ist?" {n}Cassias Kopf senkt sich vor Enttäuschung leicht.{/n} "Es gibt noch einen anderen Namen dafür: die 'ewige Blume'. Eine lebende Pflanze, die einhundert Jahre lang im Vakuum des Weltraums überleben kann. Sie ist das Symbol für Anfänge ... und für ein uraltes Ritual. Sie markiert den Anfangspunkt, von dem aus die Beziehung zwischen zwei Personen erwachsen kann, sich über höfliche Gleichgültigkeit hinaus entwickeln kann."

languages.text: "Yani... İmmortaliumların ne olduğunu bilmiyor musun?" {n}Cassia, hayal kırıklığıyla hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "İmmortaliumun başka bir adı daha vardır... 'Ebedî çiçek' de denir. Yüzlerce yıl boyunca uzay boşluğunda bile hayatta kalabilen bir çiçektir bu. Başlangıçların sembolüdür... Ayrıca kadim bir âdetin de. İki kişi arasındaki ilişkinin gelişmesi ve aralarında kibar bir soğukluktan fazlasının yaşanması için atılan ilk adımın işaretidir."
languages.original_text: "You... you do not know what an immortalium is?" {n}Cassia's head drops slightly in disappointment.{/n} "It also goes by another name — the 'eternal flower.' A living plant that can survive in the vacuum of space for hundreds of years. It is the symbol of beginnings... and of an ancient ritual. It marks the starting point from which a relationship between two people can grow, moving beyond polite indifference."

traits.locale_text: "Yani... İmmortaliumların ne olduğunu bilmiyor musun?" {n}Cassia hayal kırıklığıyla hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "İmmortaliumun başka bir adı daha vardır... 'Ebedî çiçek' de denir. Yüzlerce yıl boyunca uzay boşluğunda bile hayatta kalabilen bir çiçektir bu. Başlangıçların sembolüdür... Ayrıca kadim bir âdetin de. İki kişi arasındaki ilişkinin gelişmesi ve aralarında kibar bir soğukluktan fazlasının yaşanması için bir başlangıç noktasının işaretidir."
